definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: China's rise has been on everyone's lips in recent years.

sentences.english: The modern sculpture outside the new library is the talk of the town.

sentences.english: Hardware Acceleration is a major topic these days.
